about_the_game:
This is a simple dungeon crawler game for those who like to just crawl through dungeons. You can play alone or in co-op.
The point of the game is as follows:
1. Choose a hero.
2. Go to the dungeons.
3. Fight there with enemies.
4. Try to collect the top set of equipment.
5. Level up your hero.

Classes


There are 4 hero classes to choose from in the game:
  • Knight (tank)
  • Barbarian (melee damager)
  • Archer (ranged damager)
  • Warlock (mage damager)

Skills

There are 30 skills to choose from in the game. These are either skills that require stamina or magic skills that require mana.

Equipment

The game has procedural generation of dropped equipment. This gives about 100.000 different variations of armor and weapons, all of which have different stats and buffs.

Dungeons

The game has procedural generation of dungeons. This gives about 1.000.000.000 variations of dungeons. Crawl through them as much as you want.

Enemies

In the dungeons you will encounter different enemies: from bugs and spiders to goblins, skeletons and... you will find out for yourself...

Combat system

The combat system is very simple, like in 'slasher' games.

name: Billion Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel i3 Gen-10 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 SUPER 4GB or equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: minimal resolution 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel i5 Gen-12 or equal
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 4060 8GB or equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: A small 'dungeon crawler' for solo and co-op: choose a hero and go to dark dungeons to fight various creatures, collect the best set of equipment and increase the hero's level. Our heroes have no final goal, there is only a path and it lies in random dungeons. But like any path - it someday ends...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese
